column4: hello people. i need help on mplayer + lame. how do you have mp3 of type mpeg1 output? my mp3 player only accepts mp3 of type mpeg1. :(
. how do you have mp3 of type mpeg1 output? my mp3 player only accepts mp3 of type mpeg1.

i have a cd player that can accept mp3 files too. the mp3 that i converted from mplayer+lame cannot be played. :( but the other files of type mpeg1 can be. i used totem to check the properties of mp3 files.
mplayer+lame results to mpegII Layer 3 CBR
you can play mp3 in totem then check the properties under movie menu.
